alert.note: Alert for Northampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 02 at 9:51PM EDT until November 03 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures in the lower 30s expected. Locally, areas along the immediate shore and coastline will likely remain slightly above freezing. * WHERE...Northampton County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
